name: CoachResearchAgent
postCreateCommand: pip install -r requirements.txt && (playwright install-deps 2>/dev/null || apt-get update -qq && apt-get install -y -qq libatk1.0-0 libatk-bridge2.0-0 libcups2 libdrm2 libxkbcommon0 libatspi2.0-0 libxcomposite1 libxdamage1 libxfixes3 libxrandr2 libgbm1 libasound2) && playwright install chromium
